section.p: This class illustrates how a role (specified by the Role stereotype and color coded according to the HL7 RIM convention) is specified in an information model. A role is specified in the HL7 Version 3 RIM as 'a competency of the Entity that plays the Role as identified, defined, guaranteed, or acknowledged by the Entity that scopes the Role'.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] person, where its type is Person
This directed association describes that the entity Person is in the role Pilot.
Contains zero or one [0..1] airline, where its type is Airline

Contains zero or one [0..1] person, where its type is Person
This directed association describes that the entity Person is in the role Pilot.
